project_descr: The project aims to accelerate implementation of energy efficiency measures in public buildings in Ukraine through Energy Saving Company modality, increase of private sector investment and introducing Energy Management Information Systems for Ukraine.

outputs.output_descr: National and local capacities for climate change resilient policies and practices enhanced
Ukraine Energy Efficiency Secretariat and Expert Hub - enhancing capacities of Ukrainian Government to develop sustainable energy strategies policies and implement policy instruments
